医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Clec14a 蛋白被发现在调节骨形成和密度中发挥重要作用含有 H 型内皮蛋白 14A (Clec14a) 的 C 型凝集素结构域在协调成骨细胞活性中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Clec14a- Protein-found-to-play-vital-role-in-regulate-bone-formation-and- Density.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Clec14a- Protein-found-to-play-vital-role-in-regulate-bone-formation-and- Density.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8715c975-f757-435e-8249-b5ee83fc5788 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 05:17:00 -0400 Clec14a protein found to play vital role in regulating bone formation and density
怀孕期间喝咖啡真的会影响孩子的神经发育吗？新研究表明可能不会母亲在怀孕期间饮用咖啡是否会对胎儿的神经发育产生影响，并可能与后代的神经发育困难有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Does-drinking-coffee-during-pregnancy-really-affect-a-childe28099s-neurodevelopment-New-study-says-likely-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Does-drinking-coffee-during-pregnancy-really-affect-a-childe28099s-neurodevelopment-New-study-says-likely-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7d9fe83-f23a-4cf6-acb3-09693d864490 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 04:40:00 -0400 Does drinking coffee during pregnancy really affect a child’s neurodevelopment? New study says likely not
新纳米粒子系统对抗肥胖研究人员推出了一种通过靶向小肠脂肪吸收来解决肥胖问题的新方法。这种尖端的纳米颗粒系统旨在将治疗分子直接输送到消化道，已显示出预防饮食引起的肥胖的巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-nanoarticle-system-fights-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-nanoarticle-system-fights-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2ea1781-21ac-4b16-bf32-74a9df982a9d Mon, 14 Oct 2024 01:00:32 -0400 New nanoparticle system fights obesity
2 型糖尿病有前景的新治疗策略今天在 UEG Week 2024 上发表的突破性研究揭示了一种有前景的 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 新治疗策略，可以显着减少甚至消除对胰岛素治疗的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Promising-new-treatment-strategy-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Promising-new-treatment-strategy-for-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccd4bdfd-3fdc-40c1-a7b0-716f87a55a94 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:37:56 -0400 Promising new treatment strategy for type 2 diabetes
加沙的目标是在第二轮脊髓灰质炎运动中实现 90% 的疫苗接种覆盖率第二轮紧急脊髓灰质炎疫苗接种活动定于 2024 年 10 月 14 日在加沙开始，为约 591,700 名 10 岁以下儿童接种第二剂新型口服脊髓灰质炎疫苗 2 型 (nOPV2) 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Gaza-aims-for-9025-vaccination-coverage-in-second-round-of-polio-campaign.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Gaza-aims-for-9025-vaccination-coverage-in-second-round-of-polio-campaign.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de6da016-8606-4fc2-8627-434ac007814f Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:32:09 -0400 Gaza aims for 90% vaccination coverage in second round of polio campaign
运动迟缓和肌张力低下区分有和没有遗传诊断的神经发育疾病患者研究人员确定了运动迟缓和肌张力低下等关键临床因素，这些因素可以预测患有神经发育障碍的儿童的遗传诊断，从而创建了一个决策树来指导临床医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Motor-delays-and-hypotonia- Differentiate-neurodevelopmental-disease-病人-with-and-without-genic-diagnoses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Motor-delays-and-hypotonia- Differentiate-neurodevelopmental-disease-病人-with-and-without-genic-diagnoses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02490ecc-64ec-4e53-bc54-d1350eefefa3 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:29:00 -0400 Motor delays and hypotonia differentiate neurodevelopmental disease patients with and without genetic diagnoses
一种理解蛋白质区室化的新方法在物理学中，由两种物质组成的系统可以根据经典混合理论进行建模，该理论考虑了每种成分对应的分数以及成分之间的相互作用。例子包括过冷水中高密度相和低密度相的共存以及莫特金属-绝缘体转变中绝缘基体中金属熔池的共存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/The-role-of-Griffiths-like-phases-in- Protein-compartmentalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/The-role-of-Griffiths-like-phases-in- Protein-compartmentalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfea8c47-2d7e-472e-aeb3-ff1467accb0b Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:08:00 -0400 A novel approach to understanding protein compartmentalization
确定独特的粪便代谢物用于子宫内膜异位症的无创诊断研究人员在患有子宫内膜异位症的女性中发现了独特的肠道微生物代谢物，为非侵入性诊断和新疗法提供了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Distinct-fecal-metabolites-identified-for-non-pressive-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Distinct-fecal-metabolites-identified-for-non-pressive-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f5e9a9f-53d2-4911-8e37-4b12de849ac9 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:05:00 -0400 Distinct fecal metabolites identified for non-invasive diagnosis of endometriosis
研究强调了儿科创伤患者护理的延误根据 2024 年 10 月 14 日欧洲急诊医学大会上公布的调查结果，由父母或护理人员带到急诊医疗部门的重伤儿童通常不会像通过救护车到达医院的儿童那样迅速得到救治。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Urgent-need-for-fairness-in-emergency-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Urgent-need-for-fairness-in-emergency-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1b689a0-da1a-4cdf-a882-845e664d459b Mon, 14 Oct 2024 00:00:00 -0400 Study highlights delays in care for pediatric trauma patients
气候变化：对应急响应的威胁日益严重国际急救医学专家警告说，气候变化可能对世界各地的急救服务产生严重影响。尽管如此，很少有国家评估了影响的规模或制定了应对计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241013/Climate-change-A-forming-threat-to-emergency-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241013/Climate-change-A-forming-threat-to-emergency-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a90c68a-c2c1-4b73-8113-0a39ae1aef5d Sun, 13 Oct 2024 23:54:40 -0400 Climate change: A growing threat to emergency response
